    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnnouncementController
    The controller for adding new announcements.
    GameController
    Manages the overall flow of the application, including game logic and user interactions.
    InvalidInputException
    Custom exception to handle invalid inputs (e.g., invalid index).
    Main
    The main class that initializes the program.
    MainController
    The controller for the main application view.
    MessageModel
    Represents a message (advertisement) in the system.
    RemoveAnnouncementController
    The controller for removing announcements.
    TableModel
    Represents the model that stores messages (advertisements) in a list.
    UserController
    Manages user interactions and actions such as adding or removing messages.
    UserView
    Represents the user interface for displaying messages and menu options.
